::Killfest/Scyther/Darkmouse::

Killfest nods, feeling the heat and seeing the red glow. "Nice 
place," he remarks, smiling.

Scyther walks up behind him, also looking around. "Should I get to a 
shuttle and be off?"

Killfest nods. "Yes, of course." He looks at Darkfate. "Could you 
lead Scyther to the nearest shuttle? Prefferebly with transwarp 
capabilities."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Darkmouse nods. "You better! We can't lose any more bots."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> ::Darkfate/Chamaleon::
> 
> Darkfate stoppen and suddenly he used his commlink and 
> saID "Chanaleon, turn off alarms and prepare the brigde"
> 
> "Yes sir" answered a voice.
> 
> The dragon walked again and soon he lead towards a tunnel, a red 
> light was shinning there and everybody could feel the heat.
> 
> "Welcome to Dragon's Lair" said one of snake head to Dribillt, 
> Killfest and their followers.
